I know this game from internet meme about people wants HL3 alot. So, i try this lineary old FPS game and expect some good story.
But what i got is not only good story but also great gameplay mechanic. That is including
[list]
[*] vehicle driving and shooting which is fun, 
[*] using gravity gun to pull and push object ([spoiler]or enemy[/spoiler]), 
[*] and the most fun of all is bugbait (all of you must agree with it).
[/list]

Now im part of people who want HL3 too.
[b]Please hear your fans gaben.[/b]
An amazing game... Even thirteen years after release. I still can't believe how well the presentation and graphics hold up today.

Найс

Puta jogo! 
Com a mecanica da engine source, o jogo fica bem mais fluido e divertido do que o primeiro HalfLife.
História fenomenal, personagens extremamente bem feitos e com personalidades bem elaboradas, interação com o ambiente, diversidade de situações e meios de locomoção e alguns puzzles legais que envolvem a Gravity Gun! 

Infelizmente a Valve nunca irá concluir a história da franquia HalfLife......

Super recomendo!

Najlepsza gra w jaką kiedykolwiek grałem. Gdy ją uruchamiam to przypominają mi się moje młodzieńcze lata , gdy jako mały dzieciak bałem się wejść do RAVENHOLM . Zakochałem się wtedy w tej grze i wróciłem do niej po ponad 10 latach , i nadal gra się w nią wspaniale . Mimo oczywistego odbieganania grafiki w stosunku do gier nowocześniejszych , nie był to dla mnie jakiś wielki problem bo gra posiada wspaniałą fabułę i gameplay .  KOCHAM TĘ GRĘ !!! <3                                                           
      ( I CZEKAM NA HALF LIFE 3 )
